name: Good Dogo Premium
detailed_description:
Unlock the full version of Good doggo with:
  • All dog skins
  • All upgrades available
  • Bonus XP

When you buy premium mode it helps us make more games in the future! Thanks for the support
- Cozy Game Pals
about_the_game:
Unlock the full version of Good doggo with:
  • All dog skins
  • All upgrades available
  • Bonus XP

When you buy premium mode it helps us make more games in the future! Thanks for the support
- Cozy Game Pals
short_description: Unlock all dogs, upgrades, and bonus XP. Thank you for supporting the developers!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows Vista SP1+
  • Processor: 1.8GHz Dual-Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 256 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.9+
  • Processor: 1.8GHz Dual-Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 256 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+, SteamOS+
  • Processor: 1.8GHz Dual-Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 256 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
